name: everyone is _streamerName: A day in the life of an average influencer
name_original: everyone is _streamerName: A day in the life of an average influencer
description:
what if an ordinary person were controlled by twitch chat....

by ben burgh

Requires twitch integration, and contains strong language

If you want to play as intended (with an audience), I will be streaming this Tuesday and Wednesday evening at https://twitch.tv/bean_borg/

Make sure you follow so you don't miss it!

made for extra credits game jam
